original_text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites, so shall also the Son of man be to this generation.
korean_text: 요나가 니느웨 사람들에게 표적이 됨과 같이 인자도 이 세대에 그러하리라

sentences.original_text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites
sentences.korean_translation: 요나가 니느웨 사람들에게 표적이 되었던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: so shall also the Son of man be
